body:
>This is an important component of a Growth experience going out next week.

This also means that fixes can be merged rapidly if I/we talk with the release engineers driving this change.

[Fixed] Funnelcake Bug: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1326252
body_text:
This is an important component of a Growth experience going out next week.

This also means that fixes can be merged rapidly if I/we talk with the release engineers driving this change.

body_html:
This is an important component of a Growth experience going out next week.

This also means that fixes can be merged rapidly if I/we talk with the release engineers driving this change.

[Fixed] Funnelcake Bug: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1326252
